title: Champion Idea: Atma
body:
Name: Atma

Memo: A solider, melee based whom relies on his amount of health to deal the damage on the field. With a hidden surprise.

Now before I begin I can only give ideas, I'm not great with the numbers, so if this ever gets picked up, I leave the rest of the work to them.

Passive:  Converts a percentage of Atma's maximum HP into Attack Power.

Q: Sword Stance, this takes two forms, One sword, and Two Sword stances, both these forms change Atma's E ability

One Sword (Impaler): Slightly increased AD and increased chance to perform a crit strike.

Two Sword (Fury): Increases max Attack speed.

W: Bring Low: An on target ability which damages and saps the targets movement speed equal to a percentage of Atma's max HP

E: Two abilities, which switch in accordance to the amount of swords Atma has equipped.

One Sword (Glimmering Strike): Atma charges in a line through enemies with one slash of his sword, dealing increased damage the further he travels. 
(For instances, if he hits a target right next to him, only a bit of damage is dealt, while if he hits a target right at the end, it deal considerably more)

Two Swords (Piercing Strike): Atma throws one of his sword in a skill shot, piercing enemies till it reaches its end dealing damage and on-hit effects, as well as reducing any hit targets armour. After Atma has thrown it, he switches back to One Sword Stance, until either the cooldown on the E resets and he can switch, or he retrieves his blade, which instantly switches him back to Two Swords Stance and greatly reduces his E's cooldown.

R: Ascend: Atma loses his Q ability and gains both buffs from each stance, and takes flight, now controlling the blades with his mind from his temporary ascension he can attack with each sword from a distance.

E While Ascended: Atma's Impaler: Atma, while Ascended charges in a line, spinning his blades around him dealing damages in a larger radius until he reaches his end. This inflicts Damage and applying on-hit effects, while reducing any hit enemies armour.

Well, there you have it folks, Atma's Return. He sounds strong, so maybe tweeks can be made to him....but I feel like the League could use someone of his talents.
